meanings.sent1: My forebearers paved the way for our family's traditions.
meanings.sent2: I learned about my forebearers in a history class.
meanings.sent3: The forebearers of this old house seem to have left behind some hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The roots of our family tree run deep, connecting us to our forebearers.
meanings.sent5: The stories of our forebearers echo through the halls of time.

meanings.sent1: The forebearers of modern technology were inventors with great vision.
meanings.sent2: The forebearers of this company laid a strong foundation for its success.
meanings.sent3: It's fascinating to think about the forebearers of the first computer.
meanings.sent4: The forebearers of this ancient civilization left behind remarkable architectural wonders.
meanings.sent5: The forebearers of this musical genre set the stage for future artists.

meanings.sent1: We must honor the forebearers who fought for our freedom.
meanings.sent2: The wisdom of our forebearers guides us in times of uncertainty.
meanings.sent3: The forebearers of this town would be amazed by its modern developments.
meanings.sent4: The values instilled by our forebearers shape our decisions today.
meanings.sent5: The legacy of our forebearers lives on in our hearts and actions.
